name: cgf.cameracontrol.main.cli
description: Software that allows to contorl Blackmagicdesign ATEM Switcher and it's associated cameras
author: Simon Ensslen

scripts.prebuild: npm run atem-config-schema && npm run special-function-key-config-schema && npm run special-function-change-connection-config-schema && npm run special-function-macro-loop-config-schema && npm run special-function-macro-toggle-config-schema && npm run logitech-rumblepad2-config-schema && npm run logitech-fx10-config-schema
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc
scripts.special-function-macro-toggle-config-sch: ts-json-schema-generator --path "./src/**/*.ts" --type ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfig -o src/Hmi/Gamepad/Shared/SpecialFunctions/Macro/Toggle/ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfig.json --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --additional-properties true && ts-json-schema-generator --path "./src/**/*.ts" --type ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfigConditionAuxSelection -o src/Hmi/Gamepad/Shared/SpecialFunctions/Macro/Toggle/ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfigConditionAuxSelection.json --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --additional-properties true && ts-json-schema-generator --path "./src/**/*.ts" --type ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfigConditionKey -o src/Hmi/Gamepad/Shared/SpecialFunctions/Macro/Toggle/ISpecialFunctionMacroToggleConfigConditionKey.json --tsconfig ./tsconfig.json --additional-properties true
scripts.prestart: npm run build && shx cp src/config.json dist
